title: Round and around
creator_credit: Ivan Gaal, Ross Campbell and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
brief_description: Produced for use in primary schools to stimulate interest in Melbourne’s annual Royal Agricultural Show. Shows without commentary all the hectic activity of displays, sideshows and the excitement of the Grand Parade.
creator_credit_for_label: Ivan Gaal, Ross Campbell and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
